segments.text: What is a visa used for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a significant document for traveling abroad and visiting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . Where do I need to apply for a visa ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are passport processing center in many places . Visa is dealt with in embassies . You need to complete several forms and provide certain certificate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does it take a long time to get a visa ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not too long . 14 working days for a visa .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What materials do I need to provide ?
segments.speaker: S1
